scripts.ci:e2e:start-app: npm run ci:e2e:wait-for-db && cd ../ && wasp db migrate-dev && wasp start
scripts._comment-on-ci:e2e:cleanup-db: NOTE: the name of the DB container, e.g. name=^wasp-dev-db-e2eTestExample-, is generated by wasp and will match the name of the app definition in your `main.wasp` file, e.g. `app e2eTestExample { }`
scripts.ci:e2e:cleanup-db: (docker container rm $(docker container ls -f name=^wasp-dev-db-e2eTestExample- -q) -f || true) && docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -f name=^wasp-dev-db-e2eTestExample- -q) -f || true
